name: tr
longDescription: Translate, squeeze, and/or delete characters from standard input, writing to standard output.

options.name: complement
options.description: (‘-c’) option replaces SET1 with its complement (all of the characters that are not in SET1).

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete characters in SET1, do not translate.

options.name: squeeze-repeats
options.description: Replace  each  sequence of a repeated character that is listed in the last specified SET, with a single occurrence of that character.

options.name: truncate-set1
options.description: First truncate SET1 to length of SET2.
